channel.title: Need Help Immediately!
channel.description:
My server is being attacked by something other than a nuller (since I didn't see any nulls on server). I don't see any of the connections to the server either from the person attacking. If a player logs on, they are immediately dced within 10-20 seconds. It is also affecting my internet speed. My speed has dropped dramatically and everything is taking forever to load. I know this is because of the attacker because when I turned server off for 10 min, my speed went back to being fast.
I wanted to know if anyone could tell me what I'm being attacked by and how to stop it.

item.title: Need Help Immediately!
item.dc:creator: @mr_dope mr dope
item.description:
@mr_dope wrote:

I already iped the person but judging but how the person above said that it connects with different ips I don’t think either of those choices sound like they will work. But I haven’t tried blocking ip from router so I’ll try that

thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Immediately!
item.dc:creator: @skander1345 skander1345
item.description:
@skander1345 wrote:

ip-ban that account.
and the server will start refusing it …
also, try blocking it from your router, makes it 100% perfect

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Immediately!
item.dc:creator: @mr_dope mr dope
item.description:
@mr_dope wrote:

ok even so, thanks for all the help in identifying the problem

Also, would it help if I knew the person’s ip who was doing the ddosing? Because they made an account on the server and it’s a real ip, not an ip changer ip. I’m about 95% sure it was him

What more could I do if I knew the person’s ip?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Immediately!
item.dc:creator: @skander1345 skander1345
item.description:
@skander1345 wrote:

sorry for the late reply.
the code i know is for pi.
so basically, i guess you are stuck with the ip change option, OR contacting your ISP for help :S

item.title: Need Help Immediately!
item.dc:creator: @skander1345 skander1345
item.description:
@skander1345 wrote:

is your base delta or pi?

and no problem, i faced this issue from the first week i hosted my server … --’
i just changed the no-ip and it’s all fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Immediately!
item.dc:creator: @mr_dope mr dope
item.description:
@mr_dope wrote:

thank you so much for the help. This has never happened to me before in the 2 years I’ve been hosting so I didn’t know what to do at all

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Immediately!
item.dc:creator: @skander1345 skander1345
item.description:
@skander1345 wrote:

it’s a bot net which means many pc’s with many ip’s are flooding your server. and you may block a status checker page ip by mistake.
so the best thing to do is, change your no-ip …

i’ve heard of some codes to put on the source to block flooder ip’s, will search for it and edit the message if i find it.

Read full topic

item.description:

I have an ip blocker program called peer block. I’ve tried blocking connections but there are many different ones, even without other players connecting, so I have no idea which one I need to block

item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

DDOS Maybe? thats what it sounds like. if i where you i would shut down your server and then change your no-ip adress to somthing new then re distribute client and host again
